name: dog
description: Man's best friend! Explore a variety of breeds and find the perfect canine companion for your family.

name: cat
description: Independent and affectionate feline friends await. Adopt a cat and experience the joy of having a furry companion.

name: rabbit
description: Adopt a bunny and bring joy to your home. Discover the charm of these gentle and playful creatures.

name: duck
description: Quack-tastic ducks are looking for a loving home! Explore our duck category and add a feathered friend to your family.

name: bird
description: Feathered friends of all colors and sizes. Adopt a bird and experience the beauty and melodies they bring to your home.

name: horse
description: Majestic horses ready for adoption. If you have the space and love for a horse, explore our horse category and find your equine companion.
